page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: (Sample 59% of all possible replies) NEVER OCCASIONALLY OFTEN Cinema 41% 57% 2% Theatre 31% 67% 2% Concerts 27% 68% 5% Sport event 60% 31% 9% The nearest cinemas at Plymouth and St Austell,are over 20mls away.The only theatre is in Plymouth.Coaches are hired for popular shows(pantos etc).The league team is Plymouth Argyle-some regular supporters. During the winter,there are many entertainments staged by local groups- choirs,concerts,school plays,film shows,talks etc.The annual pantomime,which runs for a fortnight and attracts 1000people,is a major event.Written and produced by locals. Whist drives are popular and there are occasional Bingos.For young people there are8 discos a year-some in barns
